root.name: Winning Post
root.description: This Article is for the North American release of the second title in the Winning Post series. For the Japan-only first title, see Winning Post.OverviewWinning Post (Winning Post 2: Program '96 in Japan) is the first game in the Winning Post series to be released in North America. Winning Post is a horse racing simulation game where players take a horse through the various processes of training and engage in races. In Japan, the game was released for the Saturn, Playstation, and Super Famicom (Super Nintendo). In North America only the Saturn version was released.
